name: SpaceButton
description:
This is the minimal text adventure "Space Button" by
    melly_maeh and dec_hl

The goal of this funny, little game was to create an accessible text
adventure that can be played with just a single button.

You find yourself in your bedroom on board of a space station and your
task is to get ready for work.

For this you have to solve some small puzzles in the classical text
adventure style, but instead of typing out the commands you are presented
with the available commands in a list and each command is highlighted in
turn. Simply press any key (beside ESCAPE) on the keyboard or the left
mouse button to select the currently highlighted command and thus solve
the puzzles.

ESCAPE exits the game. But beware: progress can't be saved!

Windows: Just run "SpaceButton.exe"
MS-DOS: Start "RUN.BAT"

In addition to the windows and MS-DOS version of the game we provide an
online version with screen reader support at
https://openprocessing.org/sketch/1559912

The game is implemented using p5js and Javascript:
https://p5js.org/

The MS-DOS version of the game is using DOjS
https://github.com/SuperIlu/DOjS

The windows version of the game is identical to the MS-DOS version and runs in DOSBox:
https://www.dosbox.com/
